languages.text: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the wielder suffers damage more than or equal to (wounds / 4), this armour unleashes a blast of energy, dealing 20-25 power damage (with armour penetration of 10%) to any target in melee range. Base armour property: +25 Strength.

When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando el portador sufre daño igual o superior a {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, esta {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} desata un estallido de energía que inflige (de 20 a 25) de {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}daño por energía{/g} (con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 10 %) a cualquier objetivo al {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador sufre daño igual o superior a ({g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} totales del portador / 4), esta {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} desata un estallido de energía que inflige 20-25 de {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}daño por energía{/g} (con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 10 %) a cualquier objetivo al {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

Cuando el portador sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} igual o superior a {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, esta {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} desata un estallido de energía que inflige (de 20 a 25) de {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}daño por energía{/g} (con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 10 %) a cualquier objetivo al {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者受到的伤害不低于{uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}时，此{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}会释放出一股能量冲击波，对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的所有目标造成20-25点{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}高能伤害{/g}（拥有10%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。 基础护甲特性：+25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者受到的伤害不低于（装备者的最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}/4）时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}会释放出一股能量冲击波，对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战范围{/g}内的所有目标造成20-25{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}能量伤害{/g}（拥有10%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。 基础护甲特性：+25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

当装备者受到的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不低于{uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}时，此{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}会释放出一股能量冲击波，对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的所有目标造成20-25点{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}高能伤害{/g}（拥有10%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。 基础护甲特性：+25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur subit un nombre de points de dégâts supérieur ou égal à {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, cette {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} déchaîne un souffle d'énergie qui inflige (entre 20 et 25) points de {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}dégâts énergétiques{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 10 %) à toute cible située à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de combat de mêlée{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur subit un nombre de points de dégâts supérieur ou égal à (total des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur / 4), cette {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} libère un souffle d'énergie qui inflige 20 à 25 points de {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}dégâts énergétiques{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 10 %) à toute cible située à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}portée de combat de mêlée{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

Lorsque l'utilisateur subit un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supérieur ou égal à {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, cette {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} libère un souffle d'énergie qui inflige (entre 20 et 25) points de {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}dégâts énergétiques{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 10 %) à toute cible située à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de combat de mêlée{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger mehr oder denselben Schaden wie {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8} erleidet, setzt diese {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} einen Energiestoß frei, der bei jedem Ziel in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} (20 bis 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Energieschaden{/g} (mit 10 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}) verursacht. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger mehr oder denselben Schaden wie (gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Trägers /4) erleidet, setzt diese {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} einen Energiestoß frei, der 20-25 {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Energieschaden{/g} (mit {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} von 10 %) zufügt, und zwar jedem Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

Wenn der Träger mehr oder denselben {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wie {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8} erleidet, setzt diese {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} einen Energiestoß frei, der (von 20 bis 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Energieschaden{/g} (mit 10 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}) zufügt, und zwar jedem Ziel in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}以上のダメージを受けた場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}はエネルギーを勢いよく発し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}のターゲットのいずれかに（20～25）の{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}パワーダメージ{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}の確率10%）を与える。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}+25。
languages.original_text: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が(使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}合計 / 4)以上のダメージを受けた場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}はエネルギーを勢いよく発し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接範囲{/g}のターゲットのいずれかに20-25の{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}パワーダメージ{/g}({g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}の確率10%)を与える。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +25

使用者が{uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}以上の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}はエネルギーを勢いよく発し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}のターゲットのいずれかに20～25の{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}パワーダメージ{/g}({g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}の確率10%)を与える。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +25

使用者が{uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}以上のダメージを受けた場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}はエネルギーを勢いよく発し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}のターゲットのいずれかに20～25の{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}パワーダメージ{/g}({g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}の確率10%)を与える。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +25

languages.text: Когда персонаж получает урон, равный {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8} или больше, этот доспех высвобождает энергию, наносящую (от 20 до 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}силового урона{/g} любой цели на дистанции {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 10%. Базовое свойство: +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to (wearer's total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} / 4), this {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing 20-25 {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж получает урон, равный (общий запас {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажа / 4) или больше, этот доспех высвобождает энергию, наносящую 20–25 {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}силового урона{/g} любой цели на дистанции {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнего боя{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 10%. Базовое свойство: +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

Когда персонаж получает урон, равный (общий запас {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажа / 4) или больше, этот доспех высвобождает энергию, наносящую 20–25 {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}силового урона{/g} любой цели на дистанции {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнего боя{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 10%. Базовое свойство: +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

Когда персонаж получает урон, равный {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8} или больше, этот доспех высвобождает энергию, наносящую (от 20 до 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}силового урона{/g} любой цели на дистанции {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 10%. Базовое свойство: +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8} kadar veya ondan daha yüksek hasara maruz kaldığında bu {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, enerji patlaması meydana getirerek {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzili{/g} içindeki herhangi bir hedefe (20 ila 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}güç hasarı{/g} (%10 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahiptir) verir. Taban zırh özelliği: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
